summary: An email from January 31, 2020, listing tasks related to the Epstein trust, including verdict reports, website edits, will, financial transfers, insurance, and a Cambodia flight cancellation. This appears to be administrative planning shortly after Epstein's death.

events.title: Task list creation
events.description: An email was sent listing tasks related to the Epstein trust, including verdict reports, will matters, financial transfers, and flight cancellations.

keyFacts: The email is dated January 31, 2020, which is after Jeffrey Epstein's death in August 2019.
Tasks listed relate to the Epstein trust, including a will, financial transfers (AXA), and a Cambodia flight cancellation.
The document suggests ongoing administrative and financial activities related to Epstein's estate after his death.
